Title: 3. News Media
Write-Up Text: People are buzzing about the upcoming Federal Budget and what it has in store for our nation. Some are concerned the government will cut funding to essential services while others are calling for a greater focus on the cost of living. However there is some good news as new modelling suggests it's possible to return the budget to balance in nine years with some strategic cuts in spending. Despite this fears have emerged the instant asset write-off may not be extended and there are concerns around the possible implementation of new taxes. Overall it seems that people are bracing themselves for some tough decisions from the government.
